Title: Infernal Guinea Pig
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jenn Kao, Julia Fontana, Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Mike Costa (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: A murder investigation reveals the dark side of Hollywood. Chloe puts her life on the line.
